cohorts.name: [BookOfOHDSI] New users of ACE inhibitors as first-line monotherapy for hypertension

InclusionRules.name: has hypertension diagnosis in 1 yr prior to treatment
Has no prior antihypertensive drug exposures in medical history
Is only taking ACE as monotherapy, with no concomitant combination treatments

cohorts.name: [BookOfOHDSI] New users of Thiazide-like diuretics as first-line monotherapy for hypertension

InclusionRules.name: has hypertension diagnosis in 1 yr prior to treatment
Has no prior antihypertensive drug exposures in medical history
Is only taking ACE as monotherapy, with no concomitant combination treatments

featureAnalyses.name: Drug Group Era Long Term
featureAnalyses.descr: One covariate per drug rolled up to ATC groups in the drug_era table overlapping with any part of the long term window.
featureAnalyses.description: One covariate per drug rolled up to ATC groups in the drug_era table overlapping with any part of the long term window.

featureAnalyses.name: Condition Group Era Long Term
featureAnalyses.descr: One covariate per condition era rolled up to groups in the condition_era table overlapping with any part of the long term window.
featureAnalyses.description: One covariate per condition era rolled up to groups in the condition_era table overlapping with any part of the long term window.

featureAnalyses.name: Demographics Age Group
featureAnalyses.descr: Age of the subject on the index date (in 5 year age groups)
featureAnalyses.description: Age of the subject on the index date (in 5 year age groups)

featureAnalyses.name: Demographics Prior Observation Time
featureAnalyses.descr: Number of continuous days of observation time preceding the index date.
featureAnalyses.description: Number of continuous days of observation time preceding the index date.

featureAnalyses.name: Demographics Age
featureAnalyses.descr: Age of the subject on the index date (in years).
featureAnalyses.description: Age of the subject on the index date (in years).

featureAnalyses.name: Demographics Time In Cohort
featureAnalyses.descr: Number of days of observation time during cohort period.
featureAnalyses.description: Number of days of observation time during cohort period.

featureAnalyses.name: Demographics Post Observation Time
featureAnalyses.descr: Number of continuous days of observation time following the index date.
